title: The Guilt of Janet Ames
brief_description: Janet Ames’ whole world crashes when she learns that her husband has been killed in the war while saving the lives of five other men. Feeling that the survivors had no right to live, she sets out to visit and confront each one. What eventuates though, leaves Janet with a new perspective on life, which is something she did not bargain for.
